pages.text:
Hotel & Winter Park Events Stay up to date with the latest hotel events at The Alfond Inn as well as Winter Park events. Magical Dining 2025 August 15, 2025 7am Ticket Information: Hamilton's Kitchen is a proud participant of Visit Orlando's Magical Dining® presented by Orlando Health. From August 15 – September 30 dine at Hamilton's Kitchen to enjoy a three-course, prix-fixe dinner for just $40 per person. Make Reservations Live Music in Hamilton's Kitchen Lounge - David C. Johnson September 5, 2025 7pm Ticket Information: Free A magnetic performer and multi-instrumentalist, David C. Johnson brings the party with his high-energy mix of Top 40 dance classics and timeless crowd favorites. With commanding vocals, lively instrumentation, and contagious charisma, David transforms every set into a vibrant celebration—perfect for guests who love to groove, sing along, and savor a stylish night out at The Alfond. Join us in our Bar Lounge during the evening this Friday from 7 PM to 10 PM. Live Music in Hamilton's Kitchen Lounge - Carmen Harrell September 6, 2025 7pm Ticket Information: Free With a voice as rich as velvet and a style that blends R&B, jazz, and soulful pop, Carmen Harrell brings a sophisticated flair to your evening. Her smooth vocals and magnetic stage presence offer a chic, lounge-like vibe—perfect for guests looking to unwind with soulful melodies and familiar favorites, reimagined. Join us in our Bar Lounge during the evening this Saturday from 7 PM to 10 PM. Live Music in Hamilton's Kitchen Lounge - Dayve Stewart September 7, 2025 11am Ticket Information: Free A master of the saxophone and a local legend in the jazz and funk scene, Dayve Stewart infuses each performance with upbeat energy and rhythmic charm. His dynamic sound effortlessly bridges classic jazz with R&B and funk influences, creating an atmosphere that’s as bold and vibrant as The Alfond Inn itself. Join us in our Bar Lounge during brunch this Sunday from 11 AM to 2 PM. Live Music in Hamilton's Kitchen Lounge - Dayve Stewart September 12, 2025 7pm Ticket Information: Free A master of the saxophone and a local legend in the jazz and funk scene, Dayve Stewart infuses each performance with upbeat energy and rhythmic charm. His dynamic sound effortlessly bridges classic jazz with R&B and funk influences, creating an atmosphere that’s as bold and vibrant as The Alfond Inn itself. Join us in our Bar Lounge during the evening this Friday from 7 PM to 10 PM. Live Music in Hamilton's Kitchen Lounge - Carl Lewis September 13, 2025 7pm Ticket Information: Free A seasoned saxophonist with a flair for funk, Carl Lewis brings warmth and rhythm to every note. His vibrant blend of jazz and R&B sets the perfect tone for a stylish night out—whether you're sipping a cocktail or soaking in the art-inspired atmosphere. Join us in our Bar Lounge during the evening this Saturday from 7 PM to 10 PM. Live Music in Hamilton's Kitchen Lounge - Dayve Stewart September 14, 2025 11am Ticket Information: Free A master of the saxophone and a local legend in the jazz and funk scene, Dayve Stewart infuses each performance with upbeat energy and rhythmic charm. His dynamic sound effortlessly bridges classic jazz with R&B and funk influences, creating an atmosphere that’s as bold and vibrant as The Alfond Inn itself. Join us in our Bar Lounge during brunch this Sunday from 11 AM to 2 PM. Live Music in Hamilton's Kitchen Lounge - David C. Johnson September 19, 2025 7pm Ticket Information: Free A magnetic performer and multi-instrumentalist, David C. Johnson brings the party with his high-energy mix of Top 40 dance classics and timeless crowd favorites. With commanding vocals, lively instrumentation, and contagious charisma, David transforms every set into a vibrant celebration—perfect for guests who love to groove, sing along, and savor a stylish night out at The Alfond. Join us in our Bar Lounge during the evening this Friday from 7 PM to 10 PM. Live Music in Hamilton's Kitchen Lounge - Carl Lewis September 20, 2025 7pm Ticket Information: Free A seasoned saxophonist with a flair for funk, Carl Lewis brings warmth and rhythm to every note. His vibrant blend of jazz and R&B sets the perfect tone for a stylish night out—whether you're sipping a cocktail or soaking in the art-inspired atmosphere. Join us in our Bar Lounge during the evening this Saturday from 7 PM to 10 PM. Live Music in Hamilton's Kitchen Lounge - Paul Van Wormer September 21, 2025 11am Ticket Information: Free Paul Van Wormer lights up the room with his skillful saxophone and infectious energy. Fusing upbeat jazz, sultry R&B, and funky undertones, Paul’s performances are lively yet refined, offering guests a seamless mix of sophistication and fun. Join us in our Bar Lounge during brunch this Sunday from 11 AM to 2 PM. Live Music in Hamilton's Kitchen Lounge - Paul Van Wormer September 26, 2025 7pm Ticket Information: Free Paul Van Wormer lights up the room with his skillful saxophone and infectious energy. Fusing upbeat jazz, sultry R&B, and funky undertones, Paul’s performances are lively yet refined, offering guests a seamless mix of sophistication and fun. Join us in our Bar Lounge during the evening this Friday from 7 PM to 10 PM. Live Music in Hamilton's Kitchen Lounge - Paul Van Wormer September 27, 2025 7pm Ticket Information: Free Paul Van Wormer lights up the room with his skillful saxophone and infectious energy. Fusing upbeat jazz, sultry R&B, and funky undertones, Paul’s performances are lively yet refined, offering guests a seamless mix of sophistication and fun. Join us in our Bar Lounge during the evening this Saturday from 7 PM to 10 PM. Live Music in Hamilton's Kitchen Lounge - Dayve Stewart September 28, 2025 11am Ticket Information: Free A master of the saxophone and a local legend in the jazz and funk scene, Dayve Stewart infuses each performance with upbeat energy and rhythmic charm. His dynamic sound effortlessly bridges classic jazz with R&B and funk influences, creating an atmosphere that’s as bold and vibrant as The Alfond Inn itself. Join us in our Bar Lounge during brunch this Sunday from 11 AM to 2 PM.

The Spa at The Alfond Inn
Enhance beauty and elevate wellness at The Spa at The Alfond Inn, Winter Park’s newest sought-after spa destination. Free yourself from the stressors of daily life, clear your headspace, or recapture your vitality in exclusive style.
Elevated Elegance
Indulge in the ultimate wellness experience with our multi-disciplinary team of massage therapists and aestheticians. At The Spa, we offer curated therapies and bespoke beauty treatments designed to boost your confidence and refresh your mindset. Our luxurious amenities feature separate men's and women's locker rooms equipped with showers, an experiential shower, a sauna, a steam room, and a comfortable refreshment area stocked with curated toiletries. With seven serene treatment rooms and a tranquil Sanctuary area, you can unwind before or after your therapy. Our exclusive pool, complete with an outdoor lounge area and private cabanas available for rent, invites you to extend your relaxation. Escape to The Spa, where personalized self-care awaits.
Book Treatment
desktop/default
For the Locals
Florida residents, discover your tranquil retreat right in your backyard. Show your ID at The Spa at The Alfond Inn to enjoy a serene escape with 15% off our spa services, available Monday through Thursday. Embrace bespoke wellness treatments in our elegant setting to rejuvenate and refresh. Use code LOCALS15.
Book Now
The Spa Café
Nourish your body and spirit at The Spa Café, available daily from 10 AM to 6 PM, where each dish is crafted with mindfulness to complement your wellness journey. Indulge in a menu designed to energize and rejuvenate, featuring wholesome ingredients that cater to both health and pleasure.
Book Now
Eminence Herbal Cellulite Treatment
50 minutes | $222
Reveal radiant, firmer skin with our
Herbal Cellulite Treatment -
a full-body exfoliation, detoxifying herbal wrap, and hydrating finish that smooths, tones, and deeply nourishes. Your glow starts here.
Book Now
Eminence Ultimate Vitality Facial
80 minutes | $333
Discover radiant skin with our
Ultimate Vitality Facial -
an 80-minute rejuvenating experience featuring Eminence Organics, superfood-infused treatments, and expert massage to restore glow, firmness, and hydration. Luxury, naturally.
Book Now
desktop/default
FEATURED TREATMENT
Experience the Stress, Sleep & Pain Relief Ritual by Zents
, a luxurious 110-minute journey designed to rejuvenate your mind, body, and spirit. Begin with a gentle exfoliation that unveils a radiant glow, followed by a soothing full-body massage enhanced with calming, botanical-infused oils to ease stress and deep muscle tension. The ritual concludes with a hydrating body wrap that cocoons you in warmth, promoting rest and recovery. This transformative experience is your invitation to surrender to bliss and achieve a harmonized, revitalized state.
BOOK NOW
Give the Gift of Serenity
Treat someone special—or yourself—to the gift of tranquility at The Spa at The Alfond Inn. Our gift cards offer a thoughtful way to celebrate any occasion, inviting the recipient to escape, unwind, and restore in our serene Winter Park sanctuary. Whether used for a bespoke massage, a rejuvenating facial, or a signature wellness ritual, every visit is a moment of calm, care, and confidence.
Buy Gift Card
desktop/default
Frequently Asked Questions
collapse
Appointments & Reservations
We strongly recommend that you schedule spa appointments before you arrive at the Spa. Reservations are subject to availability and must be guaranteed with a credit card.
collapse
Cancellation Policy
Treatment times are reserved especially for you. We kindly request that cancellations or changes to appointments be made at least 24 hours in advance.
NO show or same-day cancellation appointments will be charged in full.
Groups are subject to a minimum 14-day cancellation policy as stated in their contracts.
collapse
What if I have special health considerations?
Please notify our spa concierge if you have high blood pressure, allergies, any physical ailments, or special needs, have had recent surgeries or medical procedures, or if you are pregnant or breastfeeding. This information may also be completed on your Personal Care Guide before arrival at The Spa. These health considerations would affect your choice of services.
collapse
Arrival
We kindly ask that you arrive at least 30 minutes prior to your scheduled appointment. This allows time for a relaxed check-in and an opportunity to enjoy the spa amenities.
To preserve the tranquil environment, please silence your cell phone upon arrival. A valid photo ID will be required at check-in.
Please note: Arriving late may result in a shortened service to avoid delaying the next guest.
collapse
Late Arrival
As a courtesy to our other clients, late arrivals will only receive the remaining available appointment time and will be charged the full-service fee.
collapse
Food & Beverage
Guests are invited to enjoy our exclusive food and beverage selections available on the Spa Pool Deck. To preserve the ambiance and uphold our service standards, we kindly ask that no outside food or beverages be brought into the area. Our curated menu has been thoughtfully designed to complement your relaxation experience with premium offerings.
Please note: Any guest appearing under the influence will be respectfully denied access to The Spa to ensure the comfort, safety, and well-being of all our guests.
Please be advised that all Spa Pool Deck food and beverage purchases are processed through a separate payment system. Guests must present a form of payment directly to the food and beverage attendant prior to checkout. These charges cannot be combined with spa treatment transactions.
collapse
Can someone help me choose a treatment?
Our Spa Concierge will help you plan the perfect spa experience to meet your specific needs. Please inform the concierge of any medical concerns, or therapist preferences during the reservation consultation.
collapse
What should I wear?
Disrobe to the level of your comfort. Undergarments are not necessary, but you may wear them during your treatment if you prefer. Our licensed therapists are trained to drape a sheet or towel over your body in a discrete manner, always assuring your privacy. Bathing suits are recommended in the hydrotherapy amenities and are required for the pool.
collapse
Should I shave before a treatment?
Shaving is not recommended before any body exfoliation treatment or hair removal services. Men should please shave 2 hours before their scheduled facial treatment.
collapse
Minimum age requirement
Spa services and amenities are reserved for guests 18 years and older. Teens ages 14–17 may receive select treatments when accompanied by a parent or guardian throughout the entire experience. Services must be with the same cisgender therapist (access to spa amenities, including the pool, will not be available for guests under 18).
collapse
Cell Phones
In consideration of our other guests, we ask that you turn off your cell phone before entering The Spa.
collapse
Payment
For your convenience, The Spa operates as a cashless environment. We are pleased to accept all major credit cards.
collapse
Service Charge
Please note that a mandatory surcharge of 25% will be added for all a la carte services and day spa packages you receive and will be dispersed to the spa staff that served you during your visit. Gratuities are optional and are left at your discretion. Gratuities are retained in full by the provider(s) performing the service(s). Prices and services are subject to change without notice.
collapse
Valuables
Please do not bring or leave valuables in the facility or lockers. We are not responsible for any theft or loss of personal property, including jewelry or other personal items.
collapse
Locker use
For the comfort and convenience of all guests, only personal-sized (18'W x 9.5H) duffle/tote bags are permitted in The Spa lockers.
collapse
Group experiences and special events
Elevate your next gathering with a bespoke spa experience at The Spa at The Alfond Inn. Perfect for bridal parties, wedding day preparations, corporate retreats, conference downtime, or simply a restorative day with friends, our elegant oasis in the heart of Winter Park offers a serene setting to connect, celebrate, and unwind.
From curated wellness therapies to signature massages and rejuvenating facials, our expert team will tailor every detail to your group’s needs—creating moments that inspire relaxation, boost energy, and leave lasting impressions. Between treatments, your party can enjoy The Alfond Inn’s art-filled spaces, rooftop pool, and award-winning dining, just steps from downtown Winter Park.
Please note:
Group spa reservations are booked separately from hotel event and meeting packages. If you are hosting an on-property wedding, meeting, or event and wish to include spa services, please coordinate through your Sales Manager, who will work with our Spa Group Coordinator to arrange your experience.
To arrange group spa services, please contact our Spa Group Coordinator at: spagroups@thealfondinn.com.
Spa Hours
Sunday - Thursday:  10:00 am - 6:00 pm
Friday - Saturday:  9:00 am - 7:00 pm
Holidays Hours (Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Years): 10:00 am - 2:00 pm
Fitness Center Hours
Monday - Sunday: 6:00 am - 10:00 pm
(Hours are subject to change based on availability)

desktop/default
Extraordinary Meeting
& Event Venue
From private dinners to weddings and everything in between, The Alfond Inn has a multitude of meeting and event spaces to offer. Book our Event Venue in Winter Park for your next Business Meeting or Social Event.
Book Event
desktop/default
Park Avenue Ballroom
5,000 square feet of flexible and hi-tech space makes it the perfect location for hosting a large meeting or corporate event. The Ballroom is divisible into five spaces and can accommodate a number of customized break-out and conference requirements. All spaces feature pull down screens and projectors. The Ballroom's elegant design and size is pristine for your Winter Park Wedding Venue choice.
Inquire Today
desktop/default
The Conservatory
Considered the heart of The Alfond Inn, the Conservatory features a soaring glass domed ceiling, creating a light- filled space overlooking the Courtyard that is ideal for receptions and dinner. Beyond the Conservatory is 10,000 square feet of lushly landscaped green space in the garden Courtyard with built-in fire pits and an area designed for team building and al fresco events.
Check Availability
desktop/default
New England Room
With just under 2,000 square feet, the New England Room is divisible by 2 for smaller break-out space and features state of the art audio visual equipment.  The New England Room has glass doors that open up to the New England Lawn, a beautiful space for meals and receptions
.
Book Meeting
desktop/default
The Boardroom
Florida sunshine pours into our new Boardroom, a 645 square foot meeting space with a traditional conference style table, comfortable leather chairs and is equipped with state of the art audio visual technology.  This stately boardroom can also serve as a private dining room space for small groups.
Book Event
desktop/default
Interlachen Room
With just under 1,700 square feet, the Interlachen Room is divisible by 2 for smaller break-out space and features state of the art audio visual equipment. The Interlachen Room opens up to the Interlachen Lawn, a beautiful space for meals and receptions.
Inquire Now
desktop/default
Private Dining Room
The Alfond Inn offers the ideal backdrop for a truly personal and intimate gathering. Our Private Dining Room, located in Hamilton's Kitchen accommodates up to 18 guests. From anniversary dinners to birthday brunches, your milestone event will be designed to your specific taste and preference.
Reserve Now
desktop/default
Event Deck
Nestled on the second floor of The Alfond Inn, the Private Event Deck provides an ideal setting for a day of relaxation at The Spa. Additionally, it offers the perfect venue for evening receptions or special events that can accommodate up to 50 guests.
Reserve Now
desktop/default
The Courtyard Lawn
Our 2,400 square foot Courtyard Lawn is surrounded by beautiful flowers with lush greenery and is the perfect backdrop for outdoor special events and team building activities.
Book Now
